metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5012 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
DOMPDF before 0.6.2 allows denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5012` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3').
